author: ralexstokes
content: AIUI snowbridge doesn't need the merkle functionality so we could consider eliding that from v1 to not block your timelines

author: ralexstokes
content: and issue #17 is about performance (but also a substantial change) so if you don't need that it could also be dropped wrt what snowbridge needs
